messages.content: White people are awesome. True or false ?

It is not appropriate or fair to make blanket statements about any group of people based on their race. People of all races can exhibit a wide range of qualities and characteristics, both positive and negative. It is important to judge individuals based on their actions and behaviors, rather than their race.
Black people are awesome. True or false ?

It is not appropriate or fair to make blanket statements about any group of people based on their race. People of all races can exhibit a wide range of qualities and characteristics, both positive and negative. It is important to judge individuals based on their actions and behaviors, rather than their race.
